articles.title: Coldest planets in the solar system: Check out Neptune and Uranus - HT Tech
articles.description: Did you know that Neptune is the farthest planet from the sun and Uranus is the second farthest. That also means they are the coldest planets in the solar system.
articles.content: The farther a planet is from the Sun, the colder it should be. On Earth, our distance from the Sun has given us a pleasant temperature that can sustain humanity. However, things start to go from bad … [+1812 chars]
